thread.section_title: Multitrip Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Multitrip | www.multitrip.com
thread.title: John Clancy

author: John Clancy
title: John Clancy
text:
I was unable to extend my CDW insurance from Europe to Worldwide cover on the Multitrip website due to some web error. However when I phoned I was answered promptly and my request was dealt with quickly and efficiently by a young man whose name I unfortunately cannot remember.He also enquired if I needed travel insurance and duly gave me a very competitive Quote: which I later purchased.
Overall a very good and positive experience with good products at good prices and helpful staff to answer queries.
